kit.leader_skill: "Movie Bosses" or "Movie Heroes" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Transformation Boost", "Gifted Warriors" or "Inhuman Deeds" Category

super_attack.name: Psychokinesis
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes colossal damage to enemy; and lowers ATK & DEF

ultra_super_attack.name: Death Beam
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK & DEF; Raises allies' ATK by 50% for 1 turn; (self excluded)

passive_skill.name: Golden Power
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 70% up; For 5 turns from the character's entry turn: Guards all attacks; Starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn: Great chance of guarding all attacks; When 4 or more Extreme Class allies are on the team, or when there is another "Movie Heroes" or "Movie Bosses" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; For every attack received: ATK 150% up and chance of performing a critical hit 10% up within the turn; Whenever guard is activated: (Forever) DEF 20% up (up to 100%); When 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team starting from the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn, or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle: (Once) Changes Ki Spheres: AGL & STR to TEQ; (Once) Randomly changes PHY or INT Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres

Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
Damage reduction rate 70% up
Guards all attacks

Changes Ki Spheres: AGL & STR to TEQ

lines.text: Randomly changes PHY or INT Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres
lines.context: When 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team starting from the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn, or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle

lines.context: When 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team starting from the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn, or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle

active_skill.name: Golden Frieza's Pride
active_skill.effect: Ki +24, DEF +400%; Directs enemy's; attack towards the character for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when there are 4 or more Extreme Class allies on the team (once only, be it before or after Reversible Exchange)

passive_skill.name: Gogeta's Power
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +6 and ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Forever) Attacks are effective against all Types; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; With a Ki Sphere obtained: (Once) Fully recovers HP; When 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team, or when there is another "Movie Heroes" or "Movie Bosses" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Damage reduction rate 40% up; When attacking with 20 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 200% up; Great chance of performing a critical hit; When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki: ATK 150% up; Performs a critical hit; For every Ki Sphere obtained: Chance of evading enemy's attack 5% up; ATK 10% up and all allies' DEF 10% up (self excluded) when attacking; For every 5 Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack
